name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant, also known as Sansevieria, is a hardy and low-maintenance plant. It features upright, sword-like leaves that are often variegated. Perfect for beginners, it thrives in low light conditions.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig, scientifically known as Ficus lyrata, is a popular choice for indoor decor. It has large, glossy leaves with a violin-like shape. This plant requires bright, indirect light to thrive.

name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily, or Spathiphyllum, is a beautiful flowering plant known for its elegant white blooms. It thrives in low light and helps purify indoor air. Keep the soil consistently moist for optimal growth.

name: Spider Plant
description: The Spider Plant, scientifically Chlorophytum comosum, is a popular choice for hanging baskets. It produces arching leaves with baby plantlets, creating a cascading effect. It's easy to care for and adaptable.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ Plant, or Zamioculcas zamiifolia, is a low-maintenance and drought-tolerant plant. It features glossy, dark green leaves that add a touch of elegance to any space. Thrives in low to bright, indirect light.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: The Monstera Deliciosa, simply known as Monstera, is a trendy and iconic houseplant with unique split leaves. It prefers bright, indirect light and high humidity. A favorite for interior decoration.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera, scientifically Aloe barbadensis miller, is a succulent known for its medicinal properties. It has fleshy, green leaves with a gel-like substance. Requires bright light and well-draining soil.

name: Chinese Evergreen
description: The Chinese Evergreen, or Aglaonema, is a versatile and attractive plant with patterned leaves. It can tolerate low light conditions and is known for its air-purifying qualities. Keep the soil consistently moist.
